00035 class KVILIB_API KviRegisteredUser : public KviHeapObject

00038 public:
00039         enum IgnoreFlags {
00040                 Channel=1,
00041                 Query=2,
00042                 Notice=4,
00043                 Ctcp=8,
00044                 Invite=16,
00045                 Dcc=32
00046         };
00047 
00048         KviRegisteredUser(const QString & szName);
00049         ~KviRegisteredUser();
00050 private:
00051         int                                    m_iIgnoreFlags;
00052         bool                                   m_bIgnoreEnabled;
00053         QString                                m_szName;
00054         QString                                m_szGroup;
00055         KviPointerHashTable<QString,QString> * m_pPropertyDict;   // owned properties
00056         KviPointerList<KviIrcMask>           * m_pMaskList;       // owned masks
00057 protected:
00058         // mask ownership is transferred! (always!) returns false if the mask was already there
00059         bool addMask(KviIrcMask * pMask);
00060         bool removeMask(KviIrcMask * pMask);
00061         KviIrcMask * findMask(const KviIrcMask & mask);
00062 public:
00063         int  ignoreFlags(){ return m_iIgnoreFlags; };
00064         void setIgnoreFlags(int iFlags){ m_iIgnoreFlags = iFlags; };
00065         bool ignoreEnagled(){ return m_bIgnoreEnabled; };
00066         void setIgnoreEnabled(bool bEnabled){ m_bIgnoreEnabled = bEnabled; };
00067         bool isIgnoreEnabledFor(IgnoreFlags flag);
00068 
00069         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00070         bool matches(const KviIrcMask & mask);
00071         bool matchesFixed(const KviIrcMask & mask);
00072         bool matchesFixed(const QString & szNick, const QString & szUser, const QString & szHost);
00073 
00074         void setProperty(const QString & szName, const QString & szValue);
00075         void setProperty(const QString & szName, bool szValue);
00076 
00077         void setGroup(const QString & szName) { m_szGroup = szName; };
00078         const QString & group(){ return m_szGroup; };
00079 
00080         const QString & getProperty(const QString & szName);       // returns 0 if the property is not there
00081         bool getProperty(const QString & szName, QString & szValue); // returns false if the property is not there
00082         bool getBoolProperty(const QString & szName, bool bDef = false);           // returns true if the property is there and is true
00083         // the propertyDict may be 0!
00084         KviPointerHashTable<QString,QString> * propertyDict(){ return m_pPropertyDict; };
00085         // this is never zero (but may contain no masks)
00086         KviPointerList<KviIrcMask> * maskList(){ return m_pMaskList; };
